list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: replace NotificationSettings component with NotificationPermissionModal
- Introduced NotificationPermissionModal for a streamlined and user-friendly notification permissions flow. - Removed NotificationSettings component to simplify the notification management process. - Added `hasBeenAsked` state to track whether notification permissions have already been requested. - Updated notifications slice and selectors to handle new state. - Refactored `useNotifications` hook with improved subscriptions and permission handling. - Enhanced PrimaryButton component with an optional custom style prop. - Synced `.idea` workspace configuration to reflect updates.

task.summary:
feat: add notification settings and handling
- Introduced NotificationSettings component for managing push notifications. - Added notifications slice and selectors for Redux state management. - Implemented useNotifications hook for Expo push notification support. - Updated package.json and package-lock.json with new dependencies (`expo-notifications`, `expo-device`, and others). - Synced `.idea` project files to match the updated project configuration.
refactor: simplify openLink function and update `.idea` workspace configuration

feat: replace NotificationSettings component with NotificationPermissionModal
- Introduced NotificationPermissionModal for a streamlined and user-friendly notification permissions flow. - Removed NotificationSettings component to simplify the notification management process. - Added `hasBeenAsked` state to track whether notification permissions have already been requested. - Updated notifications slice and selectors to handle new state. - Refactored `useNotifications` hook with improved subscriptions and permission handling. - Enhanced PrimaryButton component with an optional custom style prop. - Synced `.idea` workspace configuration to reflect updates.

MESSAGE.value: chore: add bun.lock file for dependency management with Bun

feat: add notification settings and handling
- Introduced NotificationSettings component for managing push notifications. - Added notifications slice and selectors for Redux state management. - Implemented useNotifications hook for Expo push notification support. - Updated package.json and package-lock.json with new dependencies (`expo-notifications`, `expo-device`, and others). - Synced `.idea` project files to match the updated project configuration.
refactor: simplify openLink function and update `.idea` workspace configuration
refactor: enhance error handling in openLink function and update `.idea` workspace configuration

feat: replace NotificationSettings with NotificationPermissionModal
- Redesigned notification handling flow with a new `NotificationPermissionModal`. - Removed `NotificationSettings` component and associated styles. - Added `hasBeenAsked` flag to notifications Redux slice for managing permission prompts. - Updated notifications selectors and Expo notification utility functions.
